thread.title: Great Hotel, Perfect Staff, Excellent location.
thread.title_full: Great Hotel, Perfect Staff, Excellent location. - Review of 1 Hotel Central Park, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Charlie T
title: Great Hotel, Perfect Staff, Excellent location.
text: I have stayed her several times and have found the hotel to be perfect. It is a wonderful hotel in a great location very close to Central Park. The staff is truly terrific and accommodating. The rooms are comfortable and nicely appointed. Will always return.
